briefTitle: Paravertebral Block, an Adjunct to General Anaesthesia for Breast Surgery?
officialTitle: Paravertebral Block, an Adjunct to General Anaesthesia for Breast Surgery?
primaryOutcomeMeasure: reduction of unplanned admissions and reduction of VAS score.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Extended mamma surgery one-sided
* ASA class I and II

Exclusion Criteria:

* All contra indications for local anaesthesia
* Coagulation disorders
* Infection
* Allergic reactions
